item.title: Weak Legacy 2 Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Weak Legacy 2 is a Roblox experience based on the globally renowned Demon Slayer franchise. Your goal is to master the Breathing Styles and become the best slayer on the server. However, to do so, you’ll need plenty of Yen and Rep… Instead of taking the regular grinding route to earn Yen and master your Breathing Style, you can redeem the active Weak Legacy 2 codes. By using the free Spins obtained from these codes, players may even unlock the First Swordsman Clan’s Tsugikuni buffs. Fill your inventory with free Spins, resets, and more by redeeming the codes featured below. 

Active Weak Legacy 2 Codes 

As of October 2025, the following codes are available for Roblox’s Legacy 2:

  • 25SPINSINSECTUPD  – 50 Spins (New)
  • INSECTUPDERESETRACE – Breathing Reset (New)
  • INSECTUPDRESETBREATHINGORART – Breathing Reset (New)

Inactive Weak Legacy 2 Codes 

As of October 2025, the following codes have expired for Roblox’s Legacy 2; however, it’s worth trying them again in case they become active.

  • 75SPINSSORRYFORBUGS
  • MOONUPDATERESETBREATHINGORART
  • 25SPINS50KLIKES
  • UPDATE2RESETRACE
  • 40KLIKESRESETBREATHINGORART
  • 5KLIKESRESETBREATHINGORART
  • UPD5ERESETRACE
  • 40KLIKESRESETBREATHINGORART
  • 1MVISITS50SPINS
  • 1KLIKES25AURASPINS
  • 50SPINSHALLOWEENEVENT

How to Redeem Weak Legacy 2 Codes 

Follow these steps to activate all the codes in Weak Legacy 2: 

  • Launch Weak Legacy 2 and head into the server. 
  • Hit “M” or click the “MENU” button to open the codes box. 
  • Enter the code into the “ENTER YOUR CODE” box. 
  • Press the “Redeem” button to activate your code.

What do the Weak Legacy 2 Codes offer?

The following buffs are added to your character after obtaining the Tsugikuni Clan:

  • +25 Strength
  •  +400 Durability
  • +6 Speed
  • ×0.8 XP
  • 10% Damage Reduction
  • Access to Sun and Moon Breathing

Here are all the Clan variants with their corresponding Spin chances:

  • First Swordsman – 0.1%
  • Mythic – 0.5%
  • Legendary – 1%
  • Rare – 15%
  • Uncommon – 22%
  • Common – 59.9%

If you want to reset your Breathing Style without spending Robux, the free Breathing Style Resets will help. Your Breathing Style automatically resets after redeeming the code.

Where to find new Weak Legacy 2 Codes? 

The best way to stay updated with the latest Weak Legacy 2 codes is to bookmark this page. We’ll update the active codes list whenever new ones are released. You can also join the game’s official Discord server to learn about new codes and other game news. New codes are typically released during updates and special events, so keep an eye on the active codes list during those times.

FAQs on Weak Legacy 2 Codes

What are the latest active Weak Legacy 2 codes?

INSECTUPDERESETRACE, INSECTUPDRESETBREATHINGORART, and 25SPINSINSECTUPD are the latest active codes for Weak Legacy 2. 

When will the Weak Legacy 2 codes expire? 

The developers haven’t released any expiration dates for the promo codes. However, you can expect the active ones to expire during new updates. 

What codes can be redeemed for free Clan Spins? 

25SPINSINSECTUPD is the only code that can be redeemed for Clan Spins. 

Do you love the beautiful game simulators in Roblox? Then be sure to check out our Insider Gaming forum, where you can take part in some discussions.

We also have code guides for other Roblox games, such as Strika, One Touch, Blue Lock, and Goalbound.

item.title: Black Ops 6 Campaign, Multiplayer & Zombies Are Free During Battlefield 6 Launch Week
item.content:encoded:
A new announcement has revealed that Black Ops 6 is getting a free trial during Battlefield 6’s launch week.

Battlefield 6 is set to launch on October 10, 2025, and many players believe that Call of Duty might be in trouble with the latest Battlefield installment poised to become the new FPS king. It appears that Activision is not going to let Battlefield 6’s launch week go empty, as they are offering an extensive free trial of Black Ops 6 during the same time period.

Black Ops 6 Free Trial Perfectly Aligns With Battlefield 6’s Launch Week

Through a recent blog post, Activision confirmed that Black Ops 6 will be available for free for an entire week, starting October 9 at 9:00 AM PT and ending October 16 at 10:00 AM PT. During this time, players will not only be able to access the entirety of the multiplayer and zombies modes, but also explore the game’s campaign for the first time. However, ranked play will not be included in the free trial.

In terms of maps and modes and other content included, players will be able to access “40+ Multiplayer Maps, all six Zombies Maps including Directed Mode, and new  content from The Haunting like the Gravity, Rig, and Mothball Multiplayer maps, Haunted Havoc Zombies limited-time mode, and more.” Check out all the featured maps and modes in the infographic embedded below:

In other news, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7’s open beta has been extended to October 9, 2025, which is also pretty close to Battlefield 6’s launch. Additionally, the game doesn’t include wall runs as the timeline doesn’t allow it. What are your thoughts on Black Ops 6 being free during Battlefield 6’s launch week? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about a US patent expert stating that “Nintendo is so wrong it hurts” about mods not counting as prior art. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
